news_items.content: Chennai: Importing of exotic fruits flood supermarkets; 1 lakh silt catch pits mapped; to be cleaned by July 31. Chennai intelligence chief transferred in IPS shake-up.
Part-time teachers hold protest, demand permanent jobs. More rainfall activity to bring respite from heat across Tamil Nadu from July 16.
15 Tamil Nadu Fishermen Return From Iran, Efforts On To Rescue Others. 3 Chennai College Students Drown In Coimbatore River. 1 Kg Cocaine Worth Rs 6 Crore.
Stay updated with the latest news on Chennai rains and events from New Indian Express.
Trump threatens 100% tariff on Russia, sanctions on nations that buy Russian oil. Golden Temple receives bomb threat over email, security tightened. 'Such threats will not be tolerated'.
Madras High Court Declines NTK's Plea For Repeat Agitation At Same Venue. 'Justice After Decades': Annamalai Hails TN ATS For Arrest Of 3 Terrorists.
Air India tragedy fallout: DGCA directs airlines to inspect fuel switches in Boeing. Trump threatens Russia with tariffs if Ukraine war is not resolved in 50 days.
Headlines today from around the world, including politics, sports, entertainment, business, and lifestyle news on Today's Breaking News section.
AI is rewriting the rules of the insurance industry; IBM Power11 targets enterprise AI adoption with zero-downtime architecture. Google's open MedGemma AI aims to improve healthcare outcomes.

Japan NTT's Data-Center Arm Plans Multibillion-Dollar Push On AI Demand. Malaysia Tightens Rules on Movement of U.S.-Made AI Chips. Pittsburgh's Old Steel Industry Gets A New Boost From AI Investments.
The latest news and top stories on artificial intelligence, including chatbots like Microsoft's ChatGPT and Google's Bard.
Dubai to debut restaurant operated by an AI chef; TSMC second-quarter sales rise 38.6% y/y, beat forecasts; Bitcoin soars to all-time peak just shy of $112,000.
